titles.title: Mid-Atlantic River Basin Commissions Review Act
Mid-Atlantic River Basin Commissions Review Act
Mid-Atlantic River Basin Commissions Review Act
Mid-Atlantic River Basin Commissions Review Act
Mid-Atlantic River Basin Commissions Review Act
To require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a review of the Mid-Atlantic River Basin Commissions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment Discharged
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 119-241.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 198.

action.text: Mr. Barrett moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3428.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To
